entries.journal_entry_description: Mayor Guh'rantt of Mos Eisley has given you the location of Peawp R'dawc.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the combat guildhall. Once there, enter and speak with Peawp R'dawc.
entries.task00_waypoint_name: Peawp R'dawc [in the Combat Guild Hall]
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Speak with Peawp R'dawc and aid her against the hooligans who are harassing Mos Eisley. She's inside the combat guildhall.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Enter the Guildhall and Speak with Peawp R'dawc
